trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 承载的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewImageColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that display images.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewImageColumn 类是特殊的类型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>类用于对逻辑上承载的单元格显示图像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewImageColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewImageColumn 具有的关联<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>中每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>相交它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell is capable of containing an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 每个单元格是否能够包含<xref:System.Drawing.Image>或<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>，具体的值取决于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency.
trans-unit.target: 显示图标可用于容纳图像的透明度。

trans-unit.source: By default, empty cells display a default error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，空单元格显示默认错误图形。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the cell style object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止此图显示的单元格的值等于`null`或<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的单元格样式对象的属性返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性`null`之前将行添加到控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 但是这不影响用于新纪录的行。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止错误图形的行中显示新的记录时控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>属性值是`true`，还必须请显式将单元格的值设置为`null`控件处理程序中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件，或者设置列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>指向的实例的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-派生类型与被重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>返回的属性`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此列类型的默认排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, configuring it for use with cell values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>类，将其配置为与单元格类型的值一起使用<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>与`valuesAreIcons`的参数值`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, optionally configuring it for use with <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> cell values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>类，根据需要配置它以用于<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>单元格值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化通过设置以下属性的列。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>|The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|初始化为其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>属性与新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>`valuesAreIcons`参数值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>|值`valuesAreIcons`参数。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>属性。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>属性。 |类型<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>的标准错误图形如果`valuesAreIcons`是`true`，如果键入<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>`valuesAreIcons`是`false`。 | 若要确保的 alpha 通道<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正确绘制单元格的值，请使用此构造函数用于`valuesAreIcons`的参数值`true`。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property of cells in this column will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that they will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要指示此列中的单元格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>属性将设置为值类型<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>以指示它们将设置为类型的值<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于创建新单元格的模板。

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>类初始化到新创建的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>此属性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>的构造函数

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!CAUTION]&1;> 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响的列的现有单元格的用户界面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新生成列后，这些更改才明显 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>列中的所有其他单元格建模之后。

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集类型不是与类型兼容<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 创建此列的一个精确副本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法可以复制的单元格一列。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，表示克隆<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置列的默认单元格样式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的默认<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>具有以下的初始属性值: |`DataGridViewCellStyle`属性 |默认值 | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|类型<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>如果初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>属性值的标准错误图形`true`; 否则为类型<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>的标准错误图形。 | 这些值重写中指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，但可能由其他单元格样式属性重写。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> cell values, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免出现的标准错误图形`null`或<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>单元格值，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>到此单元格样式对象的属性`null`或之前将行添加到控件自己错误图形。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 但是这不影响用于新纪录的行。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null` or your own error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止错误图形的行中显示新的记录时控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>属性值是`true`，还必须请显式将单元格的值设置为`null`或你自己的处理程序控件中的错误图形<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件，或者设置列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>指向的实例的属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-派生类型与被重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>返回的属性`null`或你自己错误图形。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>DefaultCellStyle 属性返回的对象的属性具有值等于类型的标准错误图形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>、 变化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>属性值设置为`true`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>为类型<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>的标准错误图形</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>具有的值等于类型的标准错误图形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>、 变化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>属性值设置为`false`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>为类型<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>的标准错误图形</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Icon></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>作为默认样式应用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串，描述列的映像。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Description property to describe the image provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用 Description 属性来描述提供的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: 此说明提供了另一种可到映像。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此外，单元格的值复制到剪贴板时，要使用的说明文本。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>的列中每个单元格的属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The textual description of the column image.
trans-unit.target: 列映像的文本说明。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此列的单元中显示的图标时该单元格的<> *1> 属性不是组和单元格的<> *1> 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Icon property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 该图标属性指定在不含任何值时列不是数据绑定的单元格和单元格的显示图标<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 对于其单元格不具有关联的图像的数据绑定列，将显示标准错误图形。

trans-unit.source: Using the Icon property rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: 使用的图标属性而不是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>属性可确保正确绘制图标的 alpha 通道。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要显示<xref:System.Drawing.Image>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>属性改为设置和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the Icon property value.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>属性的各个单元格以指示该单元格是否显示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>或图标属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>以显示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此列的单元中显示的图像时该单元格的<> *1> 属性不是组和单元格的<> *1> 属性设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Image property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 图像属性指定在不含任何值时列不是数据绑定的单元格和单元格的显示的图像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 对于其单元格不具有关联的图像的数据绑定列，将显示标准错误图形。

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要显示<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Image>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>属性改为设置和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the alpha channel of the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: 这样可确保的 alpha 通道<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正确绘制。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the Image or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value when there is no cell value.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>以指示该单元格是否显示的图像的各个单元格的属性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>时没有单元格值的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>以显示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在此列的单元格的图像布局。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref> that specifies the cell layout.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref> ，它指定单元格的布局。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个描述该列的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>用于描述列。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in this column display <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此列中的单元格显示<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保的 alpha 通道<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正确绘制值，将此属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此属性获取或设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 设置此属性还将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>属性中的列和刷新每个单元格的列显示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要替代各个单元格的指定的值，请设置该列的值后设置单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>属性返回的对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>属性具有值等于类型的标准错误图形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>，更改 ValuesAreIcons 属性值设置为`true`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>为类型<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>的标准错误图形</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>具有的值等于类型的标准错误图形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>，更改 ValuesAreIcons 属性值设置为`false`自动设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>为类型<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>的标准错误图形</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Icon></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果单元格显示类型的值<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果单元格显示类型的值<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>属性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>
